description: Stringent measures could be long-lasting, with France and Italy talking tough on transgressors.
title: Coronavirus: Europe looking to extend virus lockdowns
title_page: Coronavirus: Europe looking to extend virus lockdowns - BBC News
maintext: "The situation is serious. Take it seriously. Not since German reunification, no, not since World War Two has our country faced a challenge that depends so much on our collective solidarity," she said.
